channel.title: edge-ai on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in edge-ai on Reflections

item.title: Mobile On-device AI
item.description: AI is reshaping how we live and work - thanks to significant advancements in model capabilities and computational power centered in cloud infrastructure. At the same time, the mobile devices we carry every day - our phones and tablets - are becoming increasingly powerful. As a developer who loves exploring AI and has built mobile apps, I am fascinated by the idea of these two worlds of mobile and AI converging.

item.title: Edge AI: The Essentials
item.description: Every day we’re seeing fantastic advancements in AI, thanks to more data and powerful computers. This may make it seem like the future of AI is all about getting even more data and bigger computers. But I believe a critical and rapidly evolving piece of the puzzle is about bringing the Intelligence of Artificial Intelligence onto the devices where the data originates (eg: our phones, cameras, and IoT devices) and doing the “smarts” using their own computing capabilities.
